## renderSort() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Sort stacks of tiles so that they are ordered from back to front, shortest to tallest.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function renderSort(stacks: HexStack[]): HexStack[];
```

</td><td>

</td><td>

An array of stacks.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[HexStack](./hive-lib.hexstack.md)<!-- -->\[\]

A sorted copy of the array of stacks.
